name: Grimoire Incremental
description:
NON-FORMULAIC GAMEPLAY
Make real choices through spells to favour, interactions with the populace, and other arcane projects. Focus on combining thematic effects to wield great power. Choose between idle and clicker mechanics as you progress through runs and prestiges.
BRANCHING CHOICES
Choose how you'll use the magic available to you to shape society, and witness the impact through a changing story and play style.
COMPELLING NARRATIVE
Experience a broad story arc that grows as you progress, and branches with the choices you make and actions you take.
MANY AND VARIED MECHANICS
Unlock new ways to make those numbers bigger with practice, research, spells, creations, lifestyle and expeditions. Each new mechanic offers a different twist and provides new opportunities for strategy.
NO OBLIGATION
Adverts are opt-in for a bonus only. No content is blocked behind ad walls. Single in-app purchase removes ad button and gives boost forever.
